title: authme连接discuz部分玩家注册不成功
author: ailiyixi
txt_content:
特别离奇，大部分玩家去论坛注册完后能直接登陆游戏，但有一部分玩家注册完后论坛能登陆，但游戏内登录就显示没有该用户名
[16:42:56 INFO]: Disconnecting com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile@7fca47b9[id=bf1da32e-5137-3761-bf79-42b5c9232a4c,name=xiaoshu,properties={},legacy=false] (/117.140.174.120:54212): Failed to verify username!
[16:42:56 WARN]: Exception verifying xiaoshu
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.LoginListener.initUUID(LoginListener.java:136) ~[bungeecordlobby.jar:git-Paper-1509]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.LoginListener$2.run(LoginListener.java:205) ~[bungeecordlobby.jar:git-Paper-1509]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]复制代码该如何解决？

replies.author: apacheii
replies.txt_content: 用了SkinsRestorer插件没有？先暂时删除试试。

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
先把这个插件删除试试呢
bungeecordlobby.jar
